alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, north central Suffolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Revere, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boston, Lynn, Somerville, Malden, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Beverly, Chelsea, Gloucester, Melrose, Saugus, Danvers, Wakefield, Stoneham, Marblehead and Winthrop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
